name: Meklord Emperor Skiel ∞
text: Gains ATK/DEF equal to the combined ATK of all other "Wisel", "Granel", and "Skiel" monsters you control. Cannot be targeted by an opponent's card effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card (max. 1). This card gains ATK equal to the ATK of the monster equipped to it by this effect. You can only control 1 "Meklord Emperor" monster.
